dt: {bc}the state of being {d_link|dependent|dependent:1} upon one another {bc}mutual dependence

dt.t: … a form of symbiosis, of close mutual {wi}interdependence{/wi} of two species of organisms.
… the deep psychological {wi}interdependence{/wi} between ourselves and those we love.
… understood the {wi}interdependence{/wi} of mental, physical, and spiritual health.
But plants happen to grow in these little universes we call ecosystems, where they are sustained by complex webs of {wi}interdependency{/wi} with fungi, microbes, animals, and other plants.
Growing global {wi}interdependencies{/wi} further muddy the debate, making it harder to know who "we" are and what "our" national interests really are.
There are complex {wi}interdependences{/wi} among these factors …

shortdef: the state of being dependent upon one another : mutual dependence
